## API Reference

## Packages

|  Package | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [@acoustic-content-sdk/ng-app-view](./ng-app-view.md) | Module that contains a default configuration to run an \[Angular\](https://angular.io/) application against \[Acoustic Content\](https://www.ibm.com/products/watson-content-hub) in view mode. |
